casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Glenn LANE 606A05-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 16, 2017 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for Lane, Eric Glenn. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Nicholaos Vlahos, Assistant Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of March 2017 by State of NC:

*20"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of March 2017."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 21st day of April 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
